title.narrative: Enhanced enabling environment for WASH focusing on accountability/sustainability/policy, advocacy, evidence generation and use by 2018

description.narrative: The Minister of Water Resources launched the UNICEF-supported integrated digital monitoring system, the official WASH monitoring and evaluation platform for Sierra Leone, enabling the Ministry to improve generation and use of evidence in planning and policy. UNICEF co-led the coordination of the WASH pillar during 2019 flooding, and UNICEF contributed to Urban Wash Strategy and WASH sector policy review, supporting the Government to develop a more accountable and equitable enabling environment for WASH service delivery. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2019
